description: Tree Number - T1Tree Type - Hornbeam (Carpinus betulus) Approx. Diameter at 1.5m - 0.25mApprox. Height - 7mApprox. Crown Spread Diameter - 3mLocation - Front gardenService - Section dismantleWork Required - Section dismantle tree to near ground levelReason - Thinning area to promote growth of surrounding trees. To prevent destabilising nearby water featurePriority Code - ONTree Number - G1Tree Type - 3x Pears, 1x Holm Oak, 1x Hornbeam, Portuguese laurelApprox. Diameter at 1.5m - 0.2mApprox. Height - 7mApprox. Spread Diameter - 3mLocation - Southern boundary of property Service - Reduce heightWork Required - Reduce Holm Oak and Pear trees by removing approximately 2m from the height and 1m from the lateral growth. Remove 2x stems from Holm oak encroaching over wall Prune all branches touching the wall back to suitable growth points. Reason - To prevent damage to brick wall. To reduce wind sail effect of overextended vertical growthPriority Code - ONTree number - T2Tree type - Crab Apple (Malus Sylvestris)Approx Height - 3mLocation - See mapService - PruneWork required- Selectively prune up to approximately 1m to tidy. Reason - To form a more balanced shrubPriority code - ON
